LandingPage.title: Local Digital Eye
LandingPage.heroTitle: Stop Being a 'Digital Janitor'. Become a <accent>Digital Sales Director</accent>.
LandingPage.heroSubtitle: My service isn't about 'managing your social media'. I act as your Digital Sales Director. My sole objective is to generate a constant and predictable flow of high-quality client requests through Google, so your only worry is doing the work.
LandingPage.ctaSubtitle: Stop losing customers and start winning with a professional digital strategy. Let's talk.
LandingPage.copyright: © {year} Local Digital Eye. All rights reserved.

services.title: A System Designed for Your Growth

reviewFunnel.title: Intelligent Review Funnel
reviewFunnel.description: We implement a smart system to capture customer feedback, encouraging 5-star reviews on Google and allowing you to privately manage negative feedback.

aiResponder.title: AI-Powered Review Responder
aiResponder.description: Save time and maintain a professional image by generating intelligent, personalized responses to Google reviews in seconds.

seoReports.title: Local SEO Monitoring
seoReports.description: We provide you with clear metrics on your local search visibility and performance, helping you make data-driven decisions.

pillars.title: What Does the 'Digital Sales Director' Plan Include?
pillars.subtitle: This is a comprehensive, turnkey service. You pay a fee, and I handle everything.

p1.title: Digital Foundations & Authority
p1.description: Extreme optimization of your Google Profile and creation of a high-conversion landing page to establish a solid online presence.

p2.title: Active Demand Generation
p2.description: Content strategy, multimedia management, and proactive Google Ads campaigns to attract customers who are actively looking for you.

p3_legacy.title: Capture and Conversion System
p3_legacy.description: AI Voice Assistant to handle calls 24/7 and WhatsApp automation to ensure no opportunity is lost.

p4.title: Business Intelligence
p4.description: Clear monthly performance reports and strategic calls to review results and plan the next steps.

pricing.title: Transparent and Profitable Investment
pricing.subtitle: You must separate your management fee from the client's advertising investment. This is crucial for transparency.

setup.title: Setup Fee
setup.description: Covers all the initial work of the 'Digital Foundations' pillar. A fair fee for creating the entire system's base.

management.title: Digital Sales Director Fee
management.description: This is your fee for actively managing Pillars 2, 3, and 4. It includes your time, expertise, and software tools.

ads.title: Advertising Investment
ads.description: This money goes directly to Google for ads. You manage it, but it is not your income. It's the fuel for the system.

comparison.title: Don't Hire an Employee. Hire a <accent>System</accent>.
comparison.subtitle: Here's why my service isn't an expense, but a massive saving compared to the traditional alternative.
comparison.total_cost: TOTAL ANNUAL COST FOR THE BUSINESS
comparison.argument_1: A salesperson works 8 hours a day. My system works 24/7.
comparison.argument_2: A salesperson does 'cold calls'. My system attracts clients who are actively searching for you right now.
comparison.argument_3: A salesperson's performance is subjective. My system's performance is 100% measurable and transparent.
comparison.conclusion: My proposal is not to be another expense for your business, but to become your most profitable investment.

businessDiscovery.title: Business Discovery
businessDiscovery.description: Easily find and add businesses for in-depth analysis using URLs or business details.

insightfulDashboards.title: Insightful Dashboards
insightfulDashboards.description: Visualize analysis with scores, sentiments, and competitor data in a clear, actionable dashboard.

aiRecommendations.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
aiRecommendations.description: Receive AI-driven suggestions for digital services tailored to business needs and market gaps.

competitiveAnalysis.title: Competitive Analysis
competitiveAnalysis.description: Automatically identify and compare against direct competitors to understand market positioning.

geographicTargeting.title: Geographic Targeting
geographicTargeting.description: Utilize interactive maps to search businesses by category within specific geographic zones.

actionableReports.title: Actionable Reports
actionableReports.description: Generate comprehensive reports including diagnostics, recommendations, and competitive insights.

AuthLayout.title: Local Digital Eye
AuthLayout.footer: © {year} Local Digital Eye. Your partner in digital growth.

AuthPage.loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your Local Digital Eye dashboard.
AuthPage.signupSubtitle: Get started with your AI-powered local business analysis.

passwordReset.title: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
passwordReset.successDescription: Check your email for the password reset link. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

BusinessesPage.title: Analyzed Businesses
BusinessesPage.description: Manage and review your analyzed businesses.

add.title: Connect a New Business
add.subtitle: Find your business on Google to start the analysis.
add.findDescription: Enter the official name and location of your business to find it on Google Maps.
add.notFound: No business found with that name and location. Please check for typos or try a more specific location.
add.searchError: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.
add.connectSuccessDescription: The business has been successfully linked to your account.
add.connectErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
